                              <num_lsbs_param>, <offset_param>)

The parameters "num_lsbs_param" and "offset_param" are the parameters to use for the lsb encoding, i.e., the number of least significant bits and the interpretation interval offset, respectively. The parameter "time_stride_param" represents the context value of the control field time_stride.
contents.zh-CHS: 参数“num_lsbs_param”和“offset_param”分别是用于lsb编码的参数，即最低有效位的数量和解释间隔偏移。参数“time_stride_param”表示控制字段time_stride的上下文值。

contents.text: This encoding method always uses a scaled version of the field it compresses.
contents.zh-CHS: 此编码方法始终使用压缩字段的缩放版本。

contents.text: The value of the field is decoded by calculating an approximation of the scaled value, using:
contents.zh-CHS: 通过使用以下公式计算缩放值的近似值，对场值进行解码：

contents.text: tsc_ref_advanced = tsc_ref + (a_n - a_ref) / time_stride.
contents.zh-CHS: tsc_ref_advanced=tsc_ref+（a_n-a_ref）/时间步长。

contents.text: where:
contents.zh-CHS: 哪里：

contents.text: - tsc_ref is a reference value of the scaled representation of the field. - a_n is the arrival time associated with the value to decode. - a_ref is the arrival time associated with the reference header. - tsc_ref_advanced is an approximation of the scaled value of the field.
contents.zh-CHS: - tsc_ref是字段缩放表示的参考值。-a_n是与要解码的值关联的到达时间。-a_ref是与参考标头关联的到达时间。-tsc_ref_advanced是字段缩放值的近似值。

contents.text: The lsb encoding is then applied using the num_lsbs_param bits received in the compressed header and the tsc_ref_advanced as "ref_value" (as per Section 4.11.5 of [RFC4997]).
contents.zh-CHS: 然后，使用压缩报头中接收的num_lsbs_param位和作为“ref_值”的tsc_ref_高级应用lsb编码（根据[RFC4997]第4.11.5节）。

contents.text: Appendix B.3 provides an example of how the compressor can calculate jitter.
contents.zh-CHS: 附录B.3提供了压缩机如何计算抖动的示例。

contents.text: The control field time_stride controls whether or not the timer_based_lsb method is used in the CO header. The decompressor SHOULD send the CLOCK_RESOLUTION option with a zero value, if:
contents.zh-CHS: 控制字段time_stride控制CO报头中是否使用基于计时器的\u lsb方法。如果出现以下情况，解压器应发送带有零值的时钟分辨率选项：

contents.text: o it receives a non-zero time_stride value, and
contents.zh-CHS: o 它接收非零时间步长值，并且

contents.text: o it has not previously sent a CLOCK_RESOLUTION feedback with a non-zero value.
contents.zh-CHS: o 它以前没有发送非零值的时钟分辨率反馈。

contents.text: This is to allow compression to recover from the case where a compressor erroneously activates timer-based compression.
contents.zh-CHS: 这是为了允许压缩从压缩机错误激活基于计时器的压缩的情况下恢复。

contents.text: The support and usage of timer-based compression is OPTIONAL for both the compressor and the decompressor; the compressor is not required to set the time_stride control field to a non-zero value when it has received a non-zero value for the CLOCK_RESOLUTION option.
contents.zh-CHS: 基于定时器的压缩的支持和使用对于压缩机和解压缩器都是可选的；当压缩器接收到时钟分辨率选项的非零值时，无需将时间步长控制字段设置为非零值。

contents.text: 6.6.10. inferred_scaled_field
contents.zh-CHS: 6.6.10. 推断\u缩放\u字段

contents.text: The inferred_scaled_field encoding method encodes a field that is defined as changing in relation to the MSN, and for which the increase with respect to the MSN can be scaled by some scaling factor. This encoding method is used in compressed header formats that do not contain any bits for the scaled field. In this case, the decompressor infers the unscaled value of the scaled field from the MSN field. The unscaled value is calculated according to the following formula:
contents.zh-CHS: 推断的_scaled_字段编码方法对定义为相对于MSN改变的字段进行编码，并且对于该字段，相对于MSN的增加可以通过一些缩放因子进行缩放。此编码方法用于不包含缩放字段任何位的压缩头格式。在这种情况下，解压缩器从MSN字段推断缩放字段的未缩放值。未标度值根据以下公式计算：

contents.text: unscaled_value = delta_msn * stride + reference_unscaled_value
where "delta_msn" is the difference in MSN between the reference value of the MSN in the context and the value of the MSN decompressed
contents.zh-CHS: 其中，“delta_msn”是上下文中msn的参考值和解压缩的msn的值之间的msn差

contents.text: from this packet, "reference_unscaled_value" is the value of the field being scaled in the context, and "stride" is the scaling value for this field.
contents.zh-CHS: 从这个数据包中，“reference_unscaled_value”是上下文中正在缩放的字段的值，“stride”是该字段的缩放值。

contents.text: For example, when this encoding method is applied to the RTP timestamp in the RTP profile, the calculation above becomes:
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，当此编码方法应用于RTP简档中的RTP时间戳时，上述计算变为：

contents.text: timestamp = delta_msn * ts_stride + reference_timestamp
6.6.11. control_crc3_encoding
contents.zh-CHS: 6.6.11. 控制crc3编码

contents.text: The control_crc3_encoding method provides a CRC calculated over a number of control fields. The definition of this encoding method is the same as for the "crc" encoding method specified in Section 4.11.6 of [RFC4997], with the difference being that the data covered by the CRC is given by a concatenated list of control fields.
contents.zh-CHS: control_crc3_编码方法提供在多个控制字段上计算的CRC。该编码方法的定义与[RFC4997]第4.11.6节中规定的“crc”编码方法的定义相同，不同之处在于，crc覆盖的数据由控制字段的串联列表给出。

contents.text: In other words, the definition of the control_crc3_encoding method is equivalent to the following definition:
contents.zh-CHS: 换句话说，control_crc3_编码方法的定义等同于以下定义：

contents.text: where the parameter "ctrl_data_value" binds to the concatenated values of the following control fields, in the order listed below:
contents.zh-CHS: 其中，参数“ctrl_data_value”按下列顺序绑定到以下控制字段的串联值：

contents.text: o reorder_ratio, 2 bits padded with 6 MSB of zeroes
contents.zh-CHS: o 重新排序_比率，2位填充6 MSB的零

contents.text: o ts_stride, 32 bits (only for profiles 0x0101 and 0x0107)
contents.zh-CHS: o ts_步长，32位（仅适用于配置文件0x0101和0x0107）

contents.text: o time_stride, 32 bits (only for profiles 0x0101 and 0x0107)
contents.zh-CHS: o 时间步长，32位（仅适用于配置文件0x0101和0x0107）

contents.text: o msn, 16 bits (not applicable for profiles 0x0101, 0x0103, and 0x0107)
contents.zh-CHS: o msn，16位（不适用于配置文件0x0101、0x0103和0x0107）

contents.text: o coverage_behavior, 2 bits padded with 6 MSB of zeroes (only for profiles 0x0107 and 0x0108)
contents.zh-CHS: o 覆盖率_行为，2位填充6 MSB的零（仅适用于配置文件0x0107和0x0108）

contents.text: o ip_id_behavior, one octet for each IP header in the compressible header chain starting from the outermost header. Each octet consists of 2 bits padded with 6 MSBs of zeroes.
contents.zh-CHS: o ip_id_行为，在可压缩报头链中，从最外层报头开始的每个ip报头对应一个八位组。每个八位字节由2位组成，并用6个零的MSB填充。

contents.text: The "ctrl_data_length" binds to the sum of the length of the control field(s) that are applicable to the specific profile.
contents.zh-CHS: “ctrl_data_length”绑定到适用于特定配置文件的控制字段的长度总和。

contents.text: The decompressor uses the resulting 3-bit CRC to validate the control fields that are updated by the co_common and co_repair header formats; this CRC cannot be used to verify the outcome of a decompression attempt.
contents.zh-CHS: 解压器使用产生的3位CRC来验证由co_公共和co_修复头格式更新的控制字段；此CRC不能用于验证解压缩尝试的结果。

contents.text: This CRC protects the update of control fields, as the updated values are not always used to decompress the header that carries them and thus are not protected by the CRC-7 verification. This prevents impairments that could occur if the decompression of a co_common or of a co_repair succeeds and the decompressor sends positive feedback, while for some reason the control fields are incorrectly updated.
contents.zh-CHS: 该CRC保护控制字段的更新，因为更新的值并不总是用于解压携带它们的报头，因此不受CRC-7验证的保护。这可防止在co_公共或co_修复解压缩成功且解压缩器发送正反馈时，由于某种原因控制字段被错误更新时可能发生的损害。

contents.text: 6.6.12. inferred_sequential_ip_id
contents.zh-CHS: 6.6.12. 推断的\u顺序\u ip\u id

contents.text: This encoding method is used with a sequential IP-ID behavior (sequential or sequential byte-swapped) and when there are no coded IP-ID bits in the compressed header. In this case, the IP-ID offset from the MSN is constant, and the IP-ID increases by the same amount as the MSN (similar to the inferred_scaled_field encoding method).
contents.zh-CHS: 此编码方法用于顺序IP-ID行为（顺序或顺序字节交换）以及压缩头中没有编码IP-ID位时。在这种情况下，来自MSN的IP-ID偏移量是恒定的，并且IP-ID的增加量与MSN的增加量相同（类似于推断的_缩放_字段编码方法）。

contents.text: The decompressor calculates the value for the IP-ID according to the following formula:
contents.zh-CHS: 解压缩器根据以下公式计算IP-ID的值：

contents.text: IP-ID = delta_msn + reference_IP_ID_value
contents.zh-CHS: IP-ID=增量msn+参考IP-ID值

contents.text: where "delta_msn" is the difference between the reference value of the MSN in the context and the uncompressed value of the MSN associated to the compressed header, and where "reference_IP_ID_value" is the value of the IP-ID in the context. For swapped IP-ID behavior (i.e., when ip_id_behavior_innermost is set to IP_ID_BEHAVIOR_SEQUENTIAL_SWAPPED), "reference_IP_ID_value" and "IP-ID" are byte-swapped with regard to the corresponding fields in the context.
contents.zh-CHS: 其中，“delta_msn”是上下文中的msn的参考值和与压缩报头相关联的msn的未压缩值之间的差，其中“reference_IP_ID_value”是上下文中的IP-ID的值。对于交换的IP-ID行为（即，当IP_ID_behavior_innerst设置为IP_ID_behavior_SEQUENTIAL_swapped时），“reference_IP_ID_value”和“IP-ID”相对于上下文中的相应字段进行字节交换。

contents.text: If the IP-ID behavior is random or zero, this encoding method does not update any fields.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果IP-ID行为为随机或零，则此编码方法不会更新任何字段。

contents.text: 6.6.13. list_csrc(cc_value)

This encoding method compresses the list of RTP CSRC identifiers using list compression. This encoding establishes a content for the different CSRC identifiers (items) and a list describing the order in which they appear.
contents.zh-CHS: 此编码方法使用列表压缩来压缩RTP CSC标识符列表。该编码为不同的CSC标识符（项目）建立内容，并建立描述其出现顺序的列表。

contents.text: The compressor passes an argument (cc_value) to this encoding method: this is the value of the CC field taken from the RTP header. The decompressor is required to bind the value of this argument to the number of items in the list, which will allow the decompressor to correctly reconstruct the CC field.
contents.zh-CHS: 压缩器将一个参数（cc_值）传递给此编码方法：这是从RTP头获取的cc字段的值。解压器需要将此参数的值绑定到列表中的项数，这将允许解压器正确地重建CC字段。

contents.text: 6.6.13.1. List Compression

The CSRC identifiers in the uncompressed packet can be represented as an ordered list, whose order and presence are usually constant between packets. The generic structure of such a list is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 未压缩数据包中的CSC标识符可以表示为有序列表，其顺序和存在通常在数据包之间保持不变。该清单的一般结构如下：

contents.text: When performing list compression on a CSRC list, each item is the uncompressed value of one CSRC identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 在对CSC列表执行列表压缩时，每个项目都是一个CSC标识符的未压缩值。

contents.text: The basic principles of list-based compression are the following:
contents.zh-CHS: 基于列表的压缩的基本原理如下：

contents.text: When initializing the context:
contents.zh-CHS: 初始化上下文时：

contents.text: 1) The complete representation of the list of CSRC identifiers is transmitted.
contents.zh-CHS: 1) 传输CSC标识符列表的完整表示。

contents.text: Then, once the context has been initialized:
contents.zh-CHS: 然后，在初始化上下文后：

contents.text: 2) When the list is unchanged, a compressed header that does not contain information about the list can be used.
contents.zh-CHS: 2) 当列表保持不变时，可以使用不包含列表信息的压缩标题。

contents.text: 3) When the list changes, a compressed list is sent in the compressed header, including a representation of its structure and order. Previously unknown items are sent uncompressed in the list, while previously known items are only represented by an index pointing to the item stored in the context.
contents.zh-CHS: 3) 当列表更改时，将在压缩头中发送压缩列表，包括其结构和顺序的表示。以前未知的项在列表中以未压缩的方式发送，而以前已知的项仅由指向存储在上下文中的项的索引表示。

contents.text: 6.6.13.2. Table-based Item Compression
contents.zh-CHS: 6.6.13.2. 基于表的项目压缩

contents.text: The table-based item compression compresses individual items sent in compressed lists. The compressor assigns a unique identifier, "Index", to each item "Item" of a list.
contents.zh-CHS: 基于表的项压缩压缩压缩在压缩列表中发送的单个项。压缩器为列表中的每个“项”分配唯一标识符“索引”。

contents.text: Compressor Logic
contents.zh-CHS: 压缩逻辑

contents.text: The compressor conceptually maintains an item table containing all items, indexed using "Index". The (Index, Item) pair is sent together in compressed lists until the compressor gains enough confidence that the decompressor has observed the mapping between items and their respective index. Confidence is obtained from the reception of an acknowledgment from the decompressor, or by sending (Index, Item) pairs using the optimistic approach. Once confidence is obtained, the index alone is sent in compressed lists to indicate the presence of the item corresponding to this index.
contents.zh-CHS: 压缩器概念上维护一个包含所有项的项表，并使用“索引”进行索引。（索引，项）对在压缩列表中一起发送，直到压缩器获得足够的置信度，即解压缩器已观察到项与其各自索引之间的映射。置信度是通过接收来自解压器的确认，或通过使用乐观方法发送（索引、项）对来获得的。一旦获得了置信度，则仅在压缩列表中发送索引，以指示存在与此索引对应的项。

contents.text: The compressor MAY reset its item table upon receiving a negative acknowledgement.
contents.zh-CHS: 压缩机可在收到否定确认后重置其项目表。

contents.text: The compressor MAY reassign an existing index to a new item by re-establishing the mapping using the procedure described above.
contents.zh-CHS: 压缩器可通过使用上述步骤重新建立映射，将现有索引重新分配给新项。

contents.text: Decompressor Logic
contents.zh-CHS: 解压逻辑

contents.text: The decompressor conceptually maintains an item table that contains all (Index, Item) pairs received. The item table is updated whenever an (Index, Item) pair is received and decompression is successful (CRC verification, or CRC-8 validation). The decompressor retrieves the item from the table whenever an Index is received without an accompanying Item.
contents.zh-CHS: 从概念上讲，解压缩程序维护一个包含所有接收到的（索引、项）对的项表。每当接收到（索引、项）对且解压缩成功（CRC验证或CRC-8验证）时，项表就会更新。每当收到没有附带项的索引时，解压器就会从表中检索该项。

contents.text: If an index is received without an accompanying Item and the decompressor does not have any context for this index, the decompressor MUST NOT deliver the packet to upper layers.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果接收到的索引没有附带项，且解压器没有该索引的任何上下文，则解压器不得将数据包交付给上层。

contents.text: 6.6.13.3. Encoding of Compressed Lists
contents.zh-CHS: 6.6.13.3. 压缩列表的编码

contents.text: Each item present in a compressed list is represented by:
contents.zh-CHS: 压缩列表中的每个项目由以下内容表示：

contents.text: o an Index into the table of items, and a presence bit indicating if a compressed representation of the item is present in the list.
contents.zh-CHS: o 项表中的索引，以及表示列表中是否存在项的压缩表示的存在位。

contents.text: o an item (if the presence bit is set).
contents.zh-CHS: o 项目（如果设置了存在位）。

contents.text: If the presence bit is not set, the item must already be known by the decompressor.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果未设置存在位，则解压缩程序必须已经知道该项。

contents.text: A compressed list of items uses the following encoding:
contents.zh-CHS: 项目的压缩列表使用以下编码：

contents.text: Reserved: MUST be set to zero; otherwise, the decompressor MUST discard the packet.
contents.zh-CHS: 保留：必须设置为零；否则，解压缩程序必须丢弃数据包。

contents.text: PS: Indicates size of XI fields:
contents.zh-CHS: PS：指示席字段的大小：

contents.text: PS = 0 indicates 4-bit XI fields;
contents.zh-CHS: PS＝0表示4位席场；

contents.text: PS = 1 indicates 8-bit XI fields.
contents.zh-CHS: PS＝1表示8位席场。

contents.text: m: Number of XI item(s) in the compressed list. Also, the value of the cc_value argument of the list_csrc encoding (see Section 6.6.13).
contents.zh-CHS: M:压缩列表中的席项数。此外，列表编码的cc_值参数的值（见第6.6.13节）。

contents.text: XI_1, ..., XI_m: m XI items. Each XI represents one item in the list of items of the uncompressed header, in the same order as they appear in the uncompressed header.
contents.zh-CHS: 西席1，…，XIIm：MXI项目。每席XI表示未压缩标头的项目列表中的一个项目，其顺序与未压缩标头中出现的顺序相同。

contents.text: The format of an XI item is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 一席项目的格式如下：

contents.text: X: Indicates whether the item is present in the list:
contents.zh-CHS: X：指示该项是否存在于列表中：

contents.text: X = 1 indicates that the item corresponding to the Index is sent in the Item_1, ..., Item_n list;
contents.zh-CHS: X=1表示与索引对应的项在项列表中发送；

contents.text: X = 0 indicates that the item corresponding to the Index is not sent.
contents.zh-CHS: X=0表示未发送与索引对应的项。

contents.text: Reserved: MUST be set to zero; otherwise, the decompressor MUST discard the packet.
contents.zh-CHS: 保留：必须设置为零；否则，解压缩程序必须丢弃数据包。

contents.text: Index: An index into the item table. See Section 6.6.13.4
contents.zh-CHS: 索引：项表中的索引。见第6.6.13.4节

contents.text: When 4-bit XI items are used, the XI items are placed in octets in the following manner:
contents.zh-CHS: 当使用4位席项目时，席项目以八种方式放置在八位位组中：

contents.text: Padding: A 4-bit Padding field is present when PS = 0 and the number of XIs is odd. The Padding field MUST be set to zero; otherwise, the decompressor MUST discard the packet.
contents.zh-CHS: 填充：当PS=0且XIs的数量为奇数时，会出现一个4位填充字段。填充字段必须设置为零；否则，解压缩程序必须丢弃数据包。

contents.text: Item 1, ..., item n: Each item corresponds to an XI with X = 1 in XI 1, ..., XI m. Each entry in the Item list is the uncompressed representation of one CSRC identifier.
contents.zh-CHS: 项目1，…，项目n：每个项目对应于席席1，XI＝1，席，…项目列表中的每个条目都是一个CSC标识符的未压缩表示。

contents.text: 6.6.13.4. Item Table Mappings

The item table for list compression is limited to 16 different items, since the RTP header can only carry at most 15 simultaneous CSRC identifiers. The effect of having more than 16 items in the item table will only cause a slight overhead to the compressor when items are swapped in/out of the item table.
contents.zh-CHS: 列表压缩的项目表限制为16个不同的项目，因为RTP头最多只能携带15个同时的CSC标识符。在项目表中有超过16个项目的效果，只会在项目在项目表中交换时对压缩器造成轻微的开销。

contents.text: 6.6.13.5. Compressed Lists in Dynamic Chain
contents.zh-CHS: 6.6.13.5. 动态链中的压缩列表

contents.text: A compressed list that is part of the dynamic chain must have all of its list items present, i.e., all X-bits in the XI list MUST be set. All items previously established in the item table that are not present in the list decompressed from this packet MUST also be retained in the decompressor context.
contents.zh-CHS: 作为动态链的一部分的压缩列表必须具有其所有列表项，即必须设置席列表中的所有X位。以前在item表中建立的、从该数据包解压的列表中不存在的所有项也必须保留在解压器上下文中。

contents.text: 6.7. Encoding Methods with External Parameters as Arguments
contents.zh-CHS: 6.7. 使用外部参数作为参数的编码方法

contents.text: A number of encoding methods in Section 6.8.2.4 have one or more arguments for which the derivation of the parameter's value is outside the scope of the ROHC-FN [RFC4997] specification of the header formats.
contents.zh-CHS: 第6.8.2.4节中的许多编码方法有一个或多个参数，其参数值的推导超出了头格式的ROHC-FN[RFC4997]规范的范围。

contents.text: The following is a list of encoding methods with external parameters as arguments, from Section 6.8.2.4:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下是第6.8.2.4节中以外部参数为参数的编码方法列表：

contents.text: o udp(profile_value, reorder_ratio_value)
contents.zh-CHS: o udp（配置文件值、重新排序比率值）

contents.text: o udp_lite(profile_value, reorder_ratio_value, coverage_behavior_value)
contents.zh-CHS: o udp_lite（配置文件_值、重新排序_比率_值、覆盖率_行为_值）

contents.text: o esp(profile_value, reorder_ratio_value)
contents.zh-CHS: o esp（配置文件值、重新排序比率值）

contents.text: o rtp(profile_value, ts_stride_value, time_stride_value, reorder_ratio_value)
contents.zh-CHS: o rtp（外形值、ts步长值、时间步长值、重新排序比率值）

contents.text: o ipv4(profile_value, is_innermost, outer_ip_flag, ip_id_behavior_value, reorder_ratio_value))
contents.zh-CHS: o ipv4（配置文件\u值、最内层、外层\u ip\u标志、ip\u id\u行为\u值、重新排序\u比率\u值））

contents.text: o ipv6(profile_value, is_innermost, outer_ip_flag, reorder_ratio_value))
contents.zh-CHS: o ipv6（配置文件值、最内层、外层ip标志、重新排序比率值））

contents.text: o iponly_baseheader(profile_value, outer_ip_flag, ip_id_behavior_value, reorder_ratio_value)
contents.zh-CHS: o i仅\u基头（配置文件\u值、外部\u ip\u标志、ip\u id\u行为\u值、重新排序\u比率\u值）

contents.text: o udp_baseheader(profile_value, outer_ip_flag, ip_id_behavior_value, reorder_ratio_value)
contents.zh-CHS: o udp_baseheader（配置文件_值、外部_ip_标志、ip_id_行为_值、重新排序比率_值）

contents.text: o udplite_baseheader(profile_value, outer_ip_flag, ip_id_behavior_value, reorder_ratio_value)
contents.zh-CHS: o udplite\u baseheader（配置文件\u值、外部\u ip\u标志、ip\u id\u行为\u值、重新排序\u比率\u值）

contents.text: o esp_baseheader(profile_value, outer_ip_flag, ip_id_behavior_value, reorder_ratio_value)
contents.zh-CHS: o esp_baseheader（配置文件_值、外部_ip_标志、ip_id_行为_值、重新排序比率_值）

contents.text: o rtp_baseheader(profile_value, ts_stride_value, time_stride_value, outer_ip_flag, ip_id_behavior_value, reorder_ratio_value)
contents.zh-CHS: o rtp_baseheader（配置文件_值、ts_步长值、时间_步长值、外部_ip_标志、ip_id_行为_值、重新排序比率_值）

contents.text: o udplite_rtp_baseheader(profile_value, ts_stride_value, time_stride_value, outer_ip_flag, ip_id_behavior_value, reorder_ratio_value, coverage_behavior_value)
contents.zh-CHS: o udplite\u rtp\u baseheader（配置文件\u值、ts\u步长\u值、时间\u步长\u值、外部\u ip\u标志、ip\u id\u行为\u值、重新排序\u比率\u值、覆盖率\u行为\u值）

contents.text: The following applies for all parameters listed below: At the compressor, the value of the parameter is set according to the recommendations for each parameter. At the decompressor, the value
contents.zh-CHS: 以下适用于以下列出的所有参数：在压缩机上，参数值根据每个参数的建议进行设置。在解压缩程序中，值

contents.text: of the parameter is set to undefined and will get bound by encoding methods, except where otherwise noted.
contents.zh-CHS: 除非另有说明，否则参数的值设置为未定义，并将由编码方法绑定。

contents.text: The following is a list of external arguments with their respective definition:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下是外部参数及其各自定义的列表：

contents.text: o profile_value:
contents.zh-CHS: o 配置文件_值：

contents.text: Set to the 16-bit number that identifies the profile used to compress this packet. When processing the static chain at the decompressor, this parameter is set to the value of the profile field in the IR header (see Section 6.8.1).
contents.zh-CHS: 设置为识别用于压缩此数据包的配置文件的16位数字。在解压器处处理静态链时，该参数设置为IR标题中的profile字段值（见第6.8.1节）。

contents.text: o reorder_ratio_value:
contents.zh-CHS: o 重新排序比率值：

contents.text: Set to a 2-bit integer value, using one of the constants whose name begins with the prefix REORDERING_ and as defined in Section 6.8.2.4.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用名称以前缀REORDERING_u开头的常数之一，并按照第6.8.2.4节的定义，将其设置为2位整数值。

contents.text: o ip_id_behavior_value:
contents.zh-CHS: o ip_id_行为_值：

contents.text: Set to a 2-bit integer value, using one of the constants whose name begins with the prefix IP_ID_BEHAVIOR_ and as defined in Section 6.8.2.4.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用名称以前缀IP_ID_BEHAVIOR_开头的常数之一，并按照第6.8.2.4节的定义，将其设置为2位整数值。

contents.text: o coverage_behavior_value:
contents.zh-CHS: o 覆盖率\行为\价值：

contents.text: Set to a 2-bit integer value, using one of the constants whose name begins with the prefix UDP_LITE_COVERAGE_ and as defined in Section 6.8.2.4.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用名称以前缀UDP_LITE_COVERAGE_开头的常数之一，并按照第6.8.2.4节的定义，将其设置为2位整数值。

contents.text: o outer_ip_flag:
contents.zh-CHS: o 外部_ip_标志：

contents.text: This parameter is set to 1 if at least one of the TOS/TC or TTL/Hop Limit fields in outer IP headers has changed compared to their reference values in the context; otherwise, it is set to 0. This flag may only be set to 1 for the "co_common" header format in the different profiles.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果外部IP头中的TOS/TC或TTL/Hop限制字段中至少有一个与上下文中的参考值相比发生了更改，则此参数设置为1；否则，它将设置为0。对于不同配置文件中的“co_common”头格式，此标志只能设置为1。

contents.text: o is_innermost:
contents.zh-CHS: o 最里面的是什么

contents.text: This boolean flag is set to 1 when processing the innermost of the compressible IP headers; otherwise, it is set to 0.
contents.zh-CHS: 当处理最内层的可压缩IP头时，此布尔标志设置为1；否则，它将设置为0。

contents.text: o ts_stride_value
contents.zh-CHS: o t__值

contents.text: The value of this parameter should be set to the expected increase in the RTP Timestamp between consecutive RTP sequence numbers. The value selected is implementation-specific. See also Section 6.6.8.
contents.zh-CHS: 此参数的值应设置为连续RTP序列号之间RTP时间戳的预期增加。所选的值是特定于实现的。另见第6.6.8节。

contents.text: o time_stride_value
contents.zh-CHS: o 时间步长值

contents.text: The value of this parameter should be set to the expected inter-arrival time between consecutive packets for the flow. The value selected is implementation-specific. This parameter MUST be set to zero, unless the compressor has received a feedback message with the CLOCK_RESOLUTION option set to a non-zero value. See also Section 6.6.9.
contents.zh-CHS: 此参数的值应设置为流的连续数据包之间的预期到达时间。所选的值是特定于实现的。此参数必须设置为零，除非压缩器已收到反馈消息，且时钟分辨率选项设置为非零值。另见第6.6.9节。

contents.text: 6.8. Header Formats
contents.zh-CHS: 6.8. 标题格式

contents.text: ROHCv2 profiles use two different header types: the Initialization and Refresh (IR) header type, and the Compressed header type (CO).
contents.zh-CHS: ROHCv2配置文件使用两种不同的头类型：初始化和刷新（IR）头类型和压缩头类型（CO）。

contents.text: The CO header type defines a number of header formats: there are two sets of base header formats, with a few additional formats that are common to both sets.
contents.zh-CHS: CO头类型定义了许多头格式：有两组基本头格式，还有一些附加格式是两组通用的。

contents.text: 6.8.1. Initialization and Refresh Header Format (IR)
contents.zh-CHS: 6.8.1. 初始化和刷新标头格式（IR）

contents.text: The IR header format uses the structure of the ROHC IR header as defined in Section 5.2.2.1 of [RFC4995].
contents.zh-CHS: IR标头格式使用[RFC4995]第5.2.2.1节中定义的ROHC IR标头结构。

contents.text: Header type: IR
contents.zh-CHS: 标题类型：IR

contents.text: This header format communicates the static part and the dynamic part of the context.
contents.zh-CHS: 此标题格式传递上下文的静态部分和动态部分。

contents.text: The ROHCv2 IR header has the following format:
contents.zh-CHS: ROHCv2 IR标头具有以下格式：

contents.text: CRC: 8-bit CRC over the entire IR-header, including any CID fields and up until the end of the dynamic chain, using the polynomial defined in [RFC4995]. For purposes of computing the CRC, the CRC field is zero.
contents.zh-CHS: CRC：使用[RFC4995]中定义的多项式，对整个IR报头（包括任何CID字段）执行8位CRC，直至动态链结束。为了计算CRC，CRC字段为零。

contents.text: Static chain: See Section 6.5.
contents.zh-CHS: 静态链：见第6.5节。

contents.text: Dynamic chain: See Section 6.5.
contents.zh-CHS: 动态链：见第6.5节。

contents.text: 6.8.2. Compressed Header Formats (CO)
contents.zh-CHS: 6.8.2. 压缩头格式（CO）

contents.text: 6.8.2.1. Design Rationale for Compressed Base Headers
contents.zh-CHS: 6.8.2.1. 压缩基头的设计原理

contents.text: The compressed header formats are defined as two separate sets for each profile: one set for the headers where the innermost IP header contains a sequential IP-ID (either network byte order or byte-swapped), and one set for the headers without sequential IP-ID (either random, zero, or no IP-ID). There are also a number of common header formats shared between both sets. In the description below, the naming convention used for header formats that belong to the sequential set is to include "seq" in the name of the format, while similarly "rnd" is used for those that belong to the non-sequential set.
contents.zh-CHS: 压缩头格式被定义为每个配置文件的两个独立集：一个用于最内层IP头包含顺序IP-ID（网络字节顺序或字节交换）的头，另一个用于不包含顺序IP-ID（随机、零或无IP-ID）的头。两个集合之间还共享许多常见的头格式。在下面的描述中，用于属于顺序集的标题格式的命名约定是在格式名称中包含“seq”，而类似地，“rnd”用于属于非顺序集的标题格式。

contents.text: The design of the header formats is derived from the field behavior analysis found in Appendix A.
contents.zh-CHS: 标题格式的设计源自附录A中的字段行为分析。

contents.text: All of the compressed base headers transmit lsb-encoded MSN bits and a CRC.
contents.zh-CHS: 所有压缩的基本报头都传输lsb编码的MSN位和CRC。

contents.text: The following header formats exist for all profiles defined in this document, and are common to both the sequential and the random header format sets:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下标题格式适用于本文档中定义的所有配置文件，并且是顺序和随机标题格式集的通用格式：

contents.text: o co_common: This format can be used to update the context when the established change pattern of a dynamic field changes, for any of the dynamic fields. However, not all dynamic fields are updated by conveying their uncompressed value; some fields can only be transmitted using a compressed representation. This format is especially useful when a rarely changing field needs to be updated. This format contains a set of flags to indicate what fields are present in the header, and its size can vary accordingly. This format is protected by a 7-bit CRC. It can update control fields, and it thus also carries a 3-bit CRC to protect those fields. This format is similar in purpose to the UOR-2-extension 3 format of [RFC3095].
contents.zh-CHS: o co_common：此格式可用于在任何动态字段的已建立更改模式更改时更新上下文。然而，并不是所有的动态字段都通过传递其未压缩的值来更新；某些字段只能使用压缩表示进行传输。当需要更新很少更改的字段时，此格式特别有用。此格式包含一组标志，用于指示标头中存在哪些字段，其大小可以相应地变化。此格式受7位CRC保护。它可以更新控制字段，因此还携带3位CRC来保护这些字段。该格式在用途上与[RFC3095]的UOR-2-扩展3格式类似。

contents.text: o co_repair: This format can be used to update the context of all the dynamic fields by conveying their uncompressed value. This is especially useful when context damage is assumed (e.g., from the reception of a NACK) and a context repair is performed. This format is protected by a 7-bit CRC. It also carries a 3-bit CRC over the control fields that it can update. This format is similar in purpose to the IR-DYN format of [RFC3095] when performing context repairs.
contents.zh-CHS: o co_repair：此格式可用于通过传递未压缩的值来更新所有动态字段的上下文。当假定环境损害（例如，从接收NACK）并且执行环境修复时，这尤其有用。此格式受7位CRC保护。它还通过控制字段携带3位CRC，可以进行更新。在执行上下文修复时，此格式的用途与[RFC3095]的IR-DYN格式类似。

contents.text: o pt_0_crc3: This format conveys only the MSN; it can therefore only update the MSN and fields that are derived from the MSN, such as IP-ID and the RTP Timestamp (for applicable profiles). It is protected by a 3-bit CRC. This format is equivalent to the UO-0 header format in [RFC3095].
contents.zh-CHS: o pt_0_crc3：此格式仅传送MSN；因此，它只能更新MSN和从MSN派生的字段，例如IP-ID和RTP时间戳（对于适用的配置文件）。它由3位CRC保护。此格式相当于[RFC3095]中的UO-0标头格式。

contents.text: o pt_0_crc7: This format has the same properties as pt_0_crc3, but is instead protected by a 7-bit CRC and contains a larger amount of lsb-encoded MSN bits. This format is useful in environments where a high amount of reordering or a high-residual error rate can occur.
contents.zh-CHS: o pt_0_crc7：此格式与pt_0_crc3具有相同的属性，但受7位CRC保护，并包含大量lsb编码的MSN位。此格式在可能发生大量重新排序或高剩余错误率的环境中非常有用。

contents.text: The following header format descriptions apply to profiles 0x0101 and 0x0107.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下标题格式说明适用于配置文件0x0101和0x0107。

contents.text: o pt_1_rnd: This format can convey changes to the MSN and to the RTP Marker bit, and it can update the RTP timestamp using scaled timestamp encoding. It is protected by a 3-bit CRC. It is similar in purpose to the UO-1 format in [RFC3095].
contents.zh-CHS: o pt_1_rnd：此格式可以将更改传递给MSN和RTP标记位，并且可以使用缩放时间戳编码更新RTP时间戳。它由3位CRC保护。其用途与[RFC3095]中的UO-1格式类似。

contents.text: o pt_1_seq_id: This format can convey changes to the MSN and to the IP-ID. It is protected by a 3-bit CRC. It is similar in purpose to the UO-1-ID format in [RFC3095].
contents.zh-CHS: o pt_1_seq_id：此格式可以将更改传送到MSN和IP-id。它受3位CRC保护。其用途与[RFC3095]中的UO-1-ID格式类似。

contents.text: o pt_1_seq_ts: This format can convey changes to the MSN and to the RTP Marker bit, and it can update the RTP Timestamp using scaled timestamp encoding. It is protected by a 3-bit CRC. It is similar in purpose to the UO-1-TS format in [RFC3095].
contents.zh-CHS: o pt_1_seq_ts：此格式可以将更改传递给MSN和RTP标记位，并且可以使用缩放时间戳编码更新RTP时间戳。它由3位CRC保护。其用途与[RFC3095]中的UO-1-TS格式类似。

contents.text: o pt_2_rnd: This format can convey changes to the MSN, to the RTP Marker bit, and to the RTP Timestamp. It is protected by a 7-bit CRC. It is similar in purpose to the UOR-2 format in [RFC3095].
contents.zh-CHS: o pt_2_rnd：此格式可以将更改传递到MSN、RTP标记位和RTP时间戳。它由7位CRC保护。其用途与[RFC3095]中的UOR-2格式类似。

contents.text: o pt_2_seq_id: This format can convey changes to the MSN and to the IP-ID. It is protected by a 7-bit CRC. It is similar in purpose to the UO-2-ID format in [RFC3095].
contents.zh-CHS: o pt_2_seq_id：此格式可将更改传送到MSN和IP-id。它受7位CRC保护。其用途与[RFC3095]中的UO-2-ID格式类似。

contents.text: o pt_2_seq_ts: This format can convey changes to the MSN, to the RTP Marker bit and it can update the RTP Timestamp using scaled timestamp encoding. It is protected by a 7-bit CRC. It is similar in purpose to the UO-2-TS format in [RFC3095].
contents.zh-CHS: o pt_2_seq_ts：此格式可以将更改传递到MSN、RTP标记位，并且可以使用缩放时间戳编码更新RTP时间戳。它由7位CRC保护。其用途与[RFC3095]中的UO-2-TS格式类似。

contents.text: o pt_2_seq_both: This format can convey changes to both the RTP Timestamp and the IP-ID, in addition to the MSN and to the Marker bit. It is protected by a 7-bit CRC. It is similar in purpose to the UOR-2-ID extension 1 format in [RFC3095].
contents.zh-CHS: o pt_2_seq_两者：除了MSN和标记位之外，该格式还可以传递对RTP时间戳和IP-ID的更改。它由7位CRC保护。其用途与[RFC3095]中的UOR-2-ID扩展1格式类似。

contents.text: The following header format descriptions apply to profiles 0x0102, 0x0103, 0x0104, and 0x0108.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下标题格式说明适用于配置文件0x0102、0x0103、0x0104和0x0108。

contents.text: o pt_1_seq_id: This format can convey changes to the MSN and to the IP-ID. It is protected by a 7-bit CRC. It is similar in purpose to the UO-1-ID format in [RFC3095].
contents.zh-CHS: o pt_1_seq_id：此格式可以将更改传送到MSN和IP-id。它受7位CRC保护。其用途与[RFC3095]中的UO-1-ID格式类似。

contents.text: o pt_2_seq_id: This format can convey changes to the MSN and to the IP-ID. It is protected by a 7-bit CRC. It is similar in purpose to the UO-2-ID format in [RFC3095].
contents.zh-CHS: o pt_2_seq_id：此格式可将更改传送到MSN和IP-id。它受7位CRC保护。其用途与[RFC3095]中的UO-2-ID格式类似。

contents.text: 6.8.2.2. co_repair Header Format
contents.zh-CHS: 6.8.2.2. co_修复头格式

contents.text: The ROHCv2 co_repair header has the following format:
contents.zh-CHS: ROHCv2 co_维修标题的格式如下：

contents.text: r1: MUST be set to zero; otherwise, the decompressor MUST discard the packet.
contents.zh-CHS: r1：必须设置为零；否则，解压缩程序必须丢弃数据包。

contents.text: CRC-7: A 7-bit CRC over the entire uncompressed header, computed using the crc7 (data_value, data_length) encoding method defined in Section 6.8.2.4, where data_value corresponds to the entire uncompressed header chain and where data_length corresponds to the length of this header chain.
contents.zh-CHS: CRC-7：整个未压缩头上的7位CRC，使用第6.8.2.4节中定义的crc7（数据_值，数据_长度）编码方法计算，其中数据_值对应于整个未压缩头链，数据_长度对应于此头链的长度。

contents.text: r2: MUST be set to zero; otherwise, the decompressor MUST discard the packet.
contents.zh-CHS: r2：必须设置为零；否则，解压缩程序必须丢弃数据包。

contents.text: CRC-3: Encoded using the control_crc3_encoding method defined in Section 6.6.11.
contents.zh-CHS: CRC-3：使用第6.6.11节中定义的控制crc3编码方法进行编码。

contents.text: Dynamic chain: See Section 6.5.
contents.zh-CHS: 动态链：见第6.5节。

contents.text: 6.8.2.3. General CO Header Format
contents.zh-CHS: 6.8.2.3. 通用CO头格式

contents.text: The CO header format communicates irregularities in the packet header. All CO formats carry a CRC and can update the context. All CO header formats use the general format defined in this section, with the exception of the co_repair format, which is defined in Section 6.8.2.2.
contents.zh-CHS: CO报头格式传递数据包报头中的异常情况。所有CO格式都带有CRC，可以更新上下文。除第6.8.2.2节中定义的CO_维修格式外，所有CO标题格式均使用本节中定义的通用格式。

contents.text: The general format for a compressed header is as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 压缩头的一般格式如下所示：

contents.text:
0   1   2   3   4   5   6   7
 --- --- --- --- --- --- --- ---
:         Add-CID octet         : if for small CIDs and CID 1-15
+---+---+---+---+---+---+---+---+
|  first octet of base header   | (with type indication)
+---+---+---+---+---+---+---+---+
:                               :
/   0, 1, or 2 octets of CID    / 1-2 octets if large CIDs
:                               :
+---+---+---+---+---+---+---+---+
/   remainder of base header    / variable length
+---+---+---+---+---+---+---+---+
:                               :
/        Irregular Chain        / variable length
:                               :
 --- --- --- --- --- --- --- ---

The base header in the figure above is the compressed representation of the innermost IP header and other header(s), if any, in the uncompressed packet. The base header formats are defined in Section 6.8.2.4. In the formal description of the header formats, the base header for each profile is labeled <profile_name>_baseheader, where <profile_name> is defined in the following table:
contents.zh-CHS: 上图中的基本报头是未压缩数据包中最内层IP报头和其他报头（如果有）的压缩表示。第6.8.2.4节定义了基本标题格式。在标题格式的正式描述中，每个概要文件的基本标题都标记为<profile\u name>\u baseheader，其中<profile\u name>在下表中定义：

contents.text: 6.8.2.4. Header Formats in ROHC-FN
contents.zh-CHS: 6.8.2.4. ROHC-FN中的标题格式

contents.zh-CHS: 本节定义了ROHCv2配置文件的一整套基本标题格式。基本标头格式使用ROHC形式表示法[RFC4997]定义。

contents.text: 6.9. Feedback Formats and Options
contents.zh-CHS: 6.9. 反馈格式和选项

contents.text: 6.9.1. Feedback Formats
contents.zh-CHS: 6.9.1. 反馈格式

contents.text: This section describes the feedback format for ROHCv2 profiles, using the formats described in Section 5.2.3 of [RFC4995].
contents.zh-CHS: 本节使用[RFC4995]第5.2.3节中所述的格式描述了ROHCv2配置文件的反馈格式。

contents.text: The Acknowledgment Number field of the feedback formats contains the least significant bits of the MSN (see Section 6.3.1) that corresponds to the reference header that is being acknowledged. A reference header is a header that has been successfully CRC-8 validated or CRC verified. If there is no reference header available, the feedback MUST carry an ACKNUMBER-NOT-VALID option. FEEDBACK-1
contents.zh-CHS: 反馈格式的确认号字段包含MSN的最低有效位（见第6.3.1节），该位对应于正在确认的参考标头。参考标头是已成功通过CRC-8验证或CRC验证的标头。如果没有可用的参考标头，则反馈必须带有ACKNUMBER-NOT-VALID选项。反馈-1

contents.text: Acknowledgment Number: The eight least significant bits of the MSN.
contents.zh-CHS: 确认号：MSN的八个最低有效位。

contents.text: A FEEDBACK-1 is an ACK. In order to send a NACK or a STATIC-NACK, FEEDBACK-2 must be used.
contents.zh-CHS: 反馈-1表示确认。为了发送NACK或静态NACK，必须使用反馈-2。

contents.text: FEEDBACK-2
contents.zh-CHS: 反馈-2

contents.text: Acktype:
contents.zh-CHS: 确认类型：

contents.text: 0 = ACK
1 = NACK
2 = STATIC-NACK
3 is reserved (MUST NOT be used for parsability)
contents.zh-CHS: 3已保留（不得用于可解析性）

contents.text: Acknowledgment Number: The least significant bits of the MSN.
contents.zh-CHS: 确认号：MSN的最低有效位。

contents.text: CRC: 8-bit CRC computed over the entire feedback payload including any CID fields but excluding the feedback type, the 'Size' field, and the 'Code' octet, using the polynomial defined in Section 5.3.1.1 of [RFC4995]. If the CID is given with an Add-CID octet, the Add-CID octet immediately precedes the FEEDBACK-1 or FEEDBACK-2 format. For purposes of computing the CRC, the CRC field is zero.
contents.zh-CHS: CRC：使用[RFC4995]第5.3.1.1节中定义的多项式，在整个反馈有效载荷（包括任何CID字段，但不包括反馈类型、“大小”字段和“代码”八位字节）上计算的8位CRC。如果CID带有Add CID八位字节，则Add CID八位字节紧跟在反馈-1或反馈-2格式之前。为了计算CRC，CRC字段为零。

contents.text: Feedback options: A variable number of feedback options, see Section 6.9.2. Options may appear in any order.
contents.zh-CHS: 反馈选项：数量可变的反馈选项，见第6.9.2节。选项可以以任何顺序出现。

contents.text: A FEEDBACK-2 of type NACK or STATIC-NACK is always implicitly an acknowledgment for a successfully decompressed packet, which corresponds to a packet whose LSBs match the Acknowledgment Number of the feedback element, unless the ACKNUMBER-NOT-VALID option (see Section 6.9.2.2) appears in the feedback element.
contents.zh-CHS: NACK或STATIC-NACK类型的FEEDBACK-2始终隐式表示对已成功解压缩数据包的确认，该数据包对应于其LSB与反馈元素的确认号匹配的数据包，除非Acknownumber-NOT-VALID选项（见第6.9.2.2节）出现在反馈元素中。

contents.text: The FEEDBACK-2 format always carries a CRC and is thus more robust than the FEEDBACK-1 format. When receiving FEEDBACK-2, the compressor MUST verify the information by computing the CRC and comparing the result with the CRC carried in the feedback format. If the two are not identical, the feedback element MUST be discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: FEEDBACK-2格式始终携带CRC，因此比FEEDBACK-1格式更健壮。当接收反馈-2时，压缩机必须通过计算CRC并将结果与反馈格式中携带的CRC进行比较来验证信息。如果两者不相同，则必须丢弃反馈元素。

contents.text: 6.9.2. Feedback Options
contents.zh-CHS: 6.9.2. 反馈选项

contents.text: A feedback option has variable length and the following general format:
contents.zh-CHS: 反馈选项具有可变长度和以下通用格式：

contents.text: Opt Type: Unsigned integer that represents the type of the feedback option. Section 6.9.2.1 through Section 6.9.2.4 describes the ROHCv2 feedback options.
contents.zh-CHS: Opt Type：表示反馈选项类型的无符号整数。第6.9.2.1节至第6.9.2.4节描述了ROHCv2反馈选项。

contents.text: Opt Len: Unsigned integer that represents the length of the Option Data field, in octets.
contents.zh-CHS: Opt Len：表示选项数据字段长度的无符号整数，以八位字节为单位。

contents.text: Option Data: Feedback type specific data. Present if the value of the Opt Len field is set to a non-zero value.
contents.zh-CHS: 选项数据：反馈类型特定的数据。如果Opt Len字段的值设置为非零值，则显示。

contents.text: 6.9.2.1. The REJECT Option
The REJECT option informs the compressor that the decompressor does not have sufficient resources to handle the flow.
contents.zh-CHS: 拒绝选项通知压缩机减压器没有足够的资源来处理流量。

contents.text: When receiving a REJECT option, the compressor MUST stop compressing the packet flow, and SHOULD refrain from attempting to increase the number of compressed packet flows for some time. The REJECT option
contents.zh-CHS: 当接收到拒绝选项时，压缩器必须停止压缩数据包流，并且应在一段时间内避免尝试增加压缩数据包流的数量。拒绝选项

contents.text: MUST NOT appear more than once in the FEEDBACK-2 format; otherwise, the compressor MUST discard the entire feedback element.
contents.zh-CHS: 不得以反馈-2格式出现多次；否则，压缩机必须丢弃整个反馈元件。

contents.text: 6.9.2.2. The ACKNUMBER-NOT-VALID Option
contents.zh-CHS: 6.9.2.2. ACKNUMBER-NOT-VALID选项无效

contents.text: The ACKNUMBER-NOT-VALID option indicates that the Acknowledgment Number field of the feedback is not valid.
contents.zh-CHS: AcknowledgeNumber-NOT-VALID选项表示反馈的确认号字段无效。

contents.text: A compressor MUST NOT use the Acknowledgment Number of the feedback to find the corresponding sent header when this option is present. When this option is used, the Acknowledgment Number field of the FEEDBACK-2 format is set to zero. Consequently, a NACK or a STATIC-NACK feedback type sent with the ACKNUMBER-NOT-VALID option is equivalent to a STATIC-NACK with respect to the type of context repair requested by the decompressor.
contents.zh-CHS: 当存在此选项时，压缩器不得使用反馈的确认号来查找相应的发送头。使用此选项时，FEEDBACK-2格式的确认号字段设置为零。因此，与ACKNUMBER-NOT-VALID选项一起发送的NACK或STATIC-NACK反馈类型在解压器请求的上下文修复类型方面等同于STATIC-NACK。

contents.text: The ACKNUMBER-NOT-VALID option MUST NOT appear more than once in the FEEDBACK-2 format; otherwise, the compressor MUST discard the entire feedback element.
contents.zh-CHS: ACKNUMBER-NOT-VALID选项不得以FEEDBACK-2格式出现多次；否则，压缩机必须丢弃整个反馈元件。

contents.text: 6.9.2.3. The CONTEXT_MEMORY Option
contents.zh-CHS: 6.9.2.3. 上下文存储选项

contents.text: The CONTEXT_MEMORY option informs the compressor that the decompressor does not have sufficient memory resources to handle the context of the packet flow, as the flow is currently compressed.
contents.zh-CHS: CONTEXT_MEMORY选项通知压缩器，解压缩器没有足够的内存资源来处理数据包流的上下文，因为数据流当前已被压缩。

contents.text: When receiving a CONTEXT_MEMORY option, the compressor SHOULD take actions to compress the packet flow in a way that requires less decompressor memory resources or stop compressing the packet flow. The CONTEXT_MEMORY option MUST NOT appear more than once in the FEEDBACK-2 format; otherwise, the compressor MUST discard the entire feedback element.
contents.zh-CHS: 当接收到CONTEXT_MEMORY选项时，压缩器应采取措施以减少解压缩器内存资源的方式压缩数据包流，或停止压缩数据包流。在反馈-2格式中，上下文记忆选项不得出现多次；否则，压缩机必须丢弃整个反馈元件。

contents.text: 6.9.2.4. The CLOCK_RESOLUTION Option
contents.zh-CHS: 6.9.2.4. 时钟分辨率选项

contents.text: The CLOCK_RESOLUTION option informs the compressor of the clock resolution of the decompressor. It also informs whether or not the decompressor supports timer-based compression of the RTP TS timestamp
contents.zh-CHS: 时钟分辨率选项通知压缩器解压缩器的时钟分辨率。它还通知解压器是否支持基于计时器的RTP TS时间戳压缩

contents.text: (see Section 6.6.9). The CLOCK_RESOLUTION option is applicable per channel, i.e., it applies to any context associated with a profile for which the option is relevant between a compressor and decompressor pair.
contents.zh-CHS: （见第6.6.9节）。CLOCK_RESOLUTION（时钟分辨率）选项适用于每个通道，即，它适用于与配置文件相关联的任何上下文，对于该配置文件，该选项在压缩器和解压缩器对之间是相关的。

contents.text: Clock resolution: Unsigned integer that represents the clock resolution of the decompressor expressed in milliseconds.
contents.zh-CHS: 时钟分辨率：无符号整数，表示解压缩程序的时钟分辨率，以毫秒为单位。

contents.text: The smallest clock resolution that can be indicated is 1 millisecond. The value zero has a special meaning: it indicates that the decompressor cannot do timer-based compression of the RTP Timestamp. The CLOCK_RESOLUTION option MUST NOT appear more than once in the FEEDBACK-2 format; otherwise, the compressor MUST discard the entire feedback element.
contents.zh-CHS: 可指示的最小时钟分辨率为1毫秒。值0有一个特殊的含义：它表示解压缩程序无法对RTP时间戳进行基于计时器的压缩。时钟分辨率选项不得以反馈-2格式出现多次；否则，压缩机必须丢弃整个反馈元件。

contents.text: 6.9.2.5. Unknown Option Types
contents.zh-CHS: 6.9.2.5. 未知选项类型

contents.text: If an option type other than those defined in this document is encountered, the compressor MUST discard the entire feedback element.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果遇到与本文档中定义的选项类型不同的选项类型，则压缩器必须丢弃整个反馈元素。

contents.text: 7. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 安全考虑

contents.text: Impairments such as bit errors on the received compressed headers, missing packets, and reordering between packets could cause the header decompressor to reconstitute erroneous packets, i.e., packets that do not match the original packet, but still have a valid IP, UDP (or UDP-Lite), and RTP headers, and possibly also valid UDP (or UDP-Lite) checksums.
contents.zh-CHS: 接收到的压缩报头上的位错误、丢失的数据包以及数据包之间的重新排序等损害可能会导致报头解压缩器重新生成错误的数据包，即与原始数据包不匹配的数据包，但仍然具有有效的IP、UDP（或UDP Lite）和RTP报头，并且可能还具有有效的UDP（或UDP Lite）校验和。

contents.text: The header compression profiles defined herein use an internal checksum for verification of reconstructed headers. This reduces the probability that a header decompressor delivers erroneous packets to upper layers without the error being noticed. In particular, the probability that consecutive erroneous packets are not detected by the internal checksum is close to zero.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文定义的报头压缩配置文件使用内部校验和来验证重构的报头。这降低了报头解压缩器向上层发送错误数据包而不注意错误的可能性。特别地，内部校验和未检测到连续错误分组的概率接近于零。

contents.text: This small but non-zero probability remains unchanged when integrity protection is applied after compression and verified before decompression, in the case where an attacker could discard or reorder packets between the compression endpoints.
contents.zh-CHS: 当完整性保护在压缩后应用并在解压缩前验证时，如果攻击者可以在压缩端点之间丢弃或重新排序数据包，则这种小但非零的概率保持不变。

contents.text: The impairments mentioned above could be caused by a malfunctioning or malicious header compressor. Such corruption may be detected with end-to-end integrity mechanisms that will not be affected by the compression. Moreover, the internal checksum can also be useful in the case of malfunctioning compressors.
contents.zh-CHS: 上述损害可能是由故障或恶意割台压缩机造成的。这种损坏可以通过不受压缩影响的端到端完整性机制来检测。此外，内部校验和在压缩机出现故障的情况下也很有用。

contents.text: Denial-of-service attacks are possible if an intruder can introduce (for example) bogus IR or FEEDBACK packets onto the link and thereby cause compression efficiency to be reduced. However, an intruder having the ability to inject arbitrary packets at the link layer in this manner raises additional security issues that dwarf those related to the use of header compression.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果入侵者能够（例如）在链路上引入虚假的IR或反馈数据包，从而导致压缩效率降低，则可能发生拒绝服务攻击。然而，能够以这种方式在链路层注入任意数据包的入侵者会引发额外的安全问题，使与使用报头压缩相关的安全问题相形见绌。

contents.text: 8. IANA Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 8. IANA考虑

contents.text: The following ROHC profile identifiers have been assigned by the IANA for the profiles defined in this document:
contents.zh-CHS: IANA为本文件中定义的配置文件分配了以下ROHC配置文件标识符：

contents.text:
Identifier        Profile
----------        -------
0x0101            ROHCv2 RTP
0x0102            ROHCv2 UDP
0x0103            ROHCv2 ESP
0x0104            ROHCv2 IP
0x0107            ROHCv2 RTP/UDP-Lite
0x0108            ROHCv2 UDP-Lite
